definition[0]: a complicated official system that is annoying or confusing because it has a lot of rules, processes etc
definition[1]: the officials who are employed rather than elected to do the work of a government, business etc
definition[2]: a system of government that uses a large number of departments and officials
definition[3]: all the complicated rules and processes of an official system, especially when they are confusing or responsible for causing a delay
example[2]: the mountain of bureaucracy which blocks the path of aid workers trying to bring help to a country in desperate need
